definitions.definition: A long rope with a sliding loop on one end, generally used in ranching to catch cattle and horses .
An image - editing function allowing the user to capture an irregularly -shaped object by drawing an approximate outline .

main_definition: A long rope with a sliding loop on one end, generally used in ranching to catch cattle and horses .
secondary_definitions: ( computing ) An image - editing function allowing the user to capture an irregularly -shaped object by drawing an approximate outline .
